pros:
Excellent employer that really values their employees, and goes the extra mile to ensure everyone is happy in their work. 
great range of staff benefits over and above basic salary.
diverse range of facilities and jobs on offer.
good ability to progress through the ranks for the right person.
cons:
Not always the highest paying organisation in the country, but as a charity they pay a fair salary.
expect a lot for the money they pay.

review_title: Friendly company with fun working enviroment!
pros:
- Lots of friendly colleagues
- Good level of progression through management ranks
-Lots of sideways movement to different job types
-Heavily invested in training
-Good company wide gym membership
cons:
-Low salary
-Low personal training rates
-Often very corporate and to do the books
